function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proliferation of mass media messages about Covid-19","Impact":"Fear and confusion among the general population","Mitigation":"Clear and consistent communication from trusted health authorities","Technologies":"Public health campaigns, social media monitoring","People":"General population","Owner":"Health authorities"},{"Description":"Coordination across diverse organizations in communication strategies","Impact":"Mixed or conflicting messages leading to uncertainty and skepticism","Mitigation":"Collaborative communication protocols and guidelines, centralized information sources","Technologies":"Communication platforms, data analytics tools","People":"Organizations, communication teams","Owner":"Public health agencies, government"}]}
